languages.text: "Те, кто желает почитать Его по-своему, должны доказать право на это. Единственная помощь, что будет верной в сих обстоятельствах — наставление. Направить к ним одного из ткачей, чтобы указал им путь защиты себя. Они либо отстоят свою веру с оружием, либо поклонятся".

"Those who wish to worship Him in their own way must prove their right to do so. The only help that would be proper in this situation is to provide instruction. Send one of the spinners to show how they can defend themselves. They will either take up arms and protect their faith or bow down."
languages.original_text: "Те, кто желает почитать Его по-своему, должны доказать право на это. Единственная помощь, что будет верной в сих обстоятельствах — наставление. Направить к ним одного из ткачей, чтобы указал им путь защиты себя. Они либо отстоят свою веру с оружием, либо поклонятся".

traits.locale_text: "Those who wish to worship Him in their own way must prove their right to do so. The only help that would be proper in this situation is to provide instruction. Send one of the weavers to show how they can defend themselves. They will either take up arms and protect their faith or bow down."

languages.text: "Wer Ihm auf seine eigene Weise dienen will, muss beweisen, dass er das Recht dazu hat. Die einzige in dieser Situation angemessene Hilfe sind Anweisungen. Schickt einen der Spinner, um ihnen zu zeigen, dass sie sich selbst verteidigen können. Sie werden zu den Waffen greifen, um ihren Glauben zu schützen, oder den Schwanz einziehen."
languages.original_text: "Those who wish to worship Him in their own way must prove their right to do so. The only help that would be proper in this situation is to provide instruction. Send one of the spinners to show how they can defend themselves. They will either take up arms and protect their faith or bow down."

traits.locale_text: "Wer Ihm auf seine eigene Weise dienen will, muss beweisen, dass er das Recht dazu hat. Die einzige in dieser Situation angemessene Hilfe sind Anweisungen. Schickt einen der Spinner, um ihnen zu zeigen, dass sie sich selbst verteidigen können. Sie werden zu den Waffen greifen, um ihren Glauben zu schützen, oder den Schwanz einziehen."

languages.text: « Ceux qui souhaitent Le vénérer selon leurs propres termes doivent d'abord affirmer la légitimité de leurs revendications. La seule aide que nous pouvons leur apporter dans ces circonstances consiste à les instruire. Envoyez-leur un tisseur pour leur apprendre à se défendre. Soit ils prendront les armes pour préserver leur foi, soit ils courberont l'échine. »
languages.original_text: "Those who wish to worship Him in their own way must prove their right to do so. The only help that would be proper in this situation is to provide instruction. Send one of the spinners to show how they can defend themselves. They will either take up arms and protect their faith or bow down."

traits.locale_text: « Ceux qui souhaitent Le vénérer selon leurs propres termes doivent d'abord affirmer la légitimité de leurs revendications. La seule aide que nous pouvons leur apporter dans ces circonstances consiste à les instruire. Envoyez-leur un tisseur pour leur apprendre à se défendre. Soit ils prendront les armes pour préserver leur foi, soit ils courberont l'échine. »

languages.text: «Quienes quieren adorarle a su manera deben demostrar su derecho a hacerlo. La única ayuda adecuada en este caso sería instruirles. Envíe a uno de los tejedores a enseñarles a defenderse. Si no empuñan las armas para proteger su fe, deberán inclinarse».
languages.original_text: "Those who wish to worship Him in their own way must prove their right to do so. The only help that would be proper in this situation is to provide instruction. Send one of the spinners to show how they can defend themselves. They will either take up arms and protect their faith or bow down."

traits.locale_text: «Quienes quieren adorarle a su manera deben demostrar su derecho a hacerlo. La única ayuda adecuada en este caso sería instruirles. Envíe a uno de los tejedores a enseñarles a defenderse. Si no empuñan las armas para proteger su fe, deberán inclinarse».

languages.text: 「自分なりの方法で主を崇拝したいと望む者は、その権利を自ら証明せねばならない。この状況で適切な唯一の手助けは指導することだ。スピナーの一人を送り込み、連中がどのようにして自分たちを守れるか見てみよう。連中にできるのは、武器を取って信仰を守るか、ひれ伏すかのどちらかだ」
languages.original_text: "Those who wish to worship Him in their own way must prove their right to do so. The only help that would be proper in this situation is to provide instruction. Send one of the spinners to show how they can defend themselves. They will either take up arms and protect their faith or bow down."

traits.locale_text: 「自分なりの方法で主を崇拝したいと望む者は、その権利を自ら証明せねばならない。この状況で適切な唯一の手助けは指導することだ。スピナーの一人を送り込み、連中がどのようにして自分たちを守れるか見てみよう。連中にできるのは、武器を取って信仰を守るか、ひれ伏すかのどちらかだ」

languages.text: “那些想以他们自己的方式祭拜帝皇的人，必须证明他们有这么做的权利。在这种情况下，我们唯一合适的协助方式，就是为他们提供指导。派一位织网者过去，让那些人明白该如何自保。他们要么拿起武器，守护自己的信仰，要么下跪投降。”
languages.original_text: "Those who wish to worship Him in their own way must prove their right to do so. The only help that would be proper in this situation is to provide instruction. Send one of the spinners to show how they can defend themselves. They will either take up arms and protect their faith or bow down."

traits.locale_text: “那些想以他们自己的方式祭拜帝皇的人，必须证明他们有这么做的权利。在这种情况下，我们唯一合适的协助方式，就是为他们提供指导。派一位织网者过去，让那些人明白该如何自保。他们要么拿起武器，守护自己的信仰，要么下跪投降。”

languages.text: "O'na kendi bildikleri şekilde ibadet etmek isteyenler, bunu yapmaya hakları olduğunu kanıtlamalıdır. Bu durumda uygun olan tek yardım da eğitimdir. Kendilerini nasıl savunabileceklerini göstermesi için bir dokur gönderelim. Ya silahlanıp inançlarını korurlar ya da boyun eğerler."
languages.original_text: "Those who wish to worship Him in their own way must prove their right to do so. The only help that would be proper in this situation is to provide instruction. Send one of the spinners to show how they can defend themselves. They will either take up arms and protect their faith or bow down."
